title: How do music producers start their own business? - Quora

response.answer_text: I could write a long answer to this but I would recommend looking up www.therecordingrevolution.com .The guy on there has all the American pep and zing and he is not bullshit, he tells you that you don't need a lot of gear, which is true and that you just have to get out there and offer your services any way you can, he offers tips on this too, he has paid for content which is almost certainly great I just haven't had time to justify spending the money... No point spending if you ain't using...see the $200 I wasted on Mac Pro video, great site it's just the digital equivalent of gym membership, you know you should go but you don't cause you are busy with other things ;)  Anyway other than that it helps to be unusual and good at writing all sorts of different genres as that expands your options at the beginning.

It is the same process as starting any new small business. Register with your tax agency, file to register your business and business name, open a bank account, hire an accountant, create products and sell them.
